name.description: The name of the service instance

cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each service instance.

mem.description: Memory to allocate to each service instance.

java_opts.description: Use to set java arguments, such as heap size or trust store location

storage.description: Storage-related configuration properties for Zipkin on DC/OS.

cassandra.description: Enable cassandra as a storage backend

cassandra_address.description: Address of the cassandra instance (must listen to port 9042)

mysql.description: Enable mysql as a storage backend

mysql_address.description: Address of the mysql instance (must listen to port 3306)

elasticsearch.description: Enable elasticsearch as a storage backend

elasticsearch_address.description: Address of the elasticsearch instance (must listen to port 9200)

networking.description: Networking-related configuration properties for Zipkin on DC/OS.

virtual-host.description: The virtual host address to configure for integration with Marathon-lb.

https-redirect.description: Whether Marathon-lb should redirect HTTP traffic to HTTPS. This requires 'virtual-host' to be set. By default, this is false.
